about_the_game:
Welcome to Dungeon Keeper: Labyrinth Legacy, a unique blend of monster farming, ecology management, and dungeon crafting set in an ever-changing roguelike world. As the guardian of a mystical dungeon, your task is to cultivate a diverse ecosystem where monsters thrive and evolve.
Key Features:
• Monster Farming: Breed and raise a wide array of monsters, each with unique traits and abilities. From zombie to golem, discover rare species and harness their powers.
• Ecology Management: Balance the needs of your monsters with the health of your dungeon’s ecosystem. Ensure that every creature plays a role in a thriving environment, influencing growth and evolution in real-time.
• Dungeon Crafting: Design and expand your own dungeon. Create complex labyrinths filled with monster that defend your realm from intruding adventurers.
• Roguelike Adventures: No two playthroughs are the same. Dynamic environments make each venture into the depths a unique challenge.
• Strategic Battles: Deploy your monsters in tactical battles against would-be heroes. Combine abilities to turn the tide of combat and protect your dungeon’s heart.
Dive into ' Dungeon Keeper: Labyrinth Legacy' and shape the fate of your very own monster sanctuary!

• Dungeon Crafting: Design and expand your own dungeon. Create complex labyrinths filled with monster that defend your realm from intruding adventurers.

name: Dungeon Keeper: Labyrinth Legacy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: window 7
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 500 mb
  • DirectX: Version 7.1
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Dungeon Keeper: Labyrinth Legacy is a dynamic tower defense. Develop your dungeon and create monsters to guard your territory against adventurers.
